definitions: lit. to clasp the Buddha's feet when danger arises (idiom); fig. to profess devotion only when in trouble
to make a hasty last-minute effort (often refers to cramming for exams)
pinyin: ping2 shi2 bu4 shao1 xiang1 , lin2 shi2 bao4 fo2 jiao3
simplified: 平时不烧香，临时抱佛脚
traditional: 平時不燒香，臨時抱佛腳
